title: Empathic Design-Based Web Collaboration Tool Development and Utilization Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage and foundational language education knowledge
context.additional_context: Customized instructional design considering learner roles and implementing project-based assessment systems

learning_goals: Learners can apply an empathic design process using web-based collaboration tools.
Learners can analyze user experience data to suggest improvements for educational technology tools.
Learners can develop educational prototypes incorporating feedback from teachers and peers.

resources: Figma or Miro Collaboration Tool License

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
